variant.p: This Standard does not apply to:

li.p: biological assets related to agricultural activity (see IAS 41 Agriculture and IAS 16 Property, Plant and Equipment); and
mineral rights and mineral reserves such as oil, natural gas and similar non‑regenerative resources.
